Reviews.Title: “Perfect.”
Reviews.Author: lyftrvlr
Reviews.Content: location decent heating system bearing mind night drop zero windows night long assume due vicinity cleanliness blood stain bathroom could say clean shower overhead water device curtain bottom hence soaking bathroom floor breakfast boring affair internet charges per device also overpriced place would advise

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, awesome location, especially for a family”
Reviews.Author: NAM77
Reviews.Content: wife read reviews hotel booking booked 3 weeks stay got rate 99 euros per night seemed slightly higher side upon arriving amsterdam realized nothing cheap staff hotel friendly allowed keep bags 4 hours checking since flight later evening whats great hotel location bang middle seemingly everything yet quite neighbourhood 3 mins van gogh museum 3 mins museum 4 mins museum 56 mins place take canal cruise 67 minutes happening leidseplein square room small isnt big surprise western europe enough one person nothing complain toilet pretty odd attached internet expensive 17 euros 24 hours access speed quite low seeing breakfast usual continental buffet 20 euros per head seemed expensive spa available didnt use even check overall hotel highly recommended location price friends tell bad deal

Reviews.Title: “Not acceptable as 4*”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel ny eve quite difficult find room time reasonable price near center stuff absolutely ok rooms spacious clean done every day price also ok

Reviews.Title: “Close to meseums, clean and tidy”

Reviews.Content: hotel location museum district right high end stores etc quick walk areas perfectly situated hotel lobby modern furniture clean well maintained nice christmas hotel staff friendly accommodating theyre helpful free pastries every morning front desk counter hotel bar staff also friendly got back new years eve dinner even tho kitchen closed bartender nice enough make us fried cheese yum hotel room 3 us made nice squeeze bathroom plenty space 3 girls share elevator think cute see walls moving theres actual elevator door euro thing think negative thing charge 9 euros fi per night per feel rather pricey either charge per night per room dont charge much

Reviews.Title: “Clean, quiet and central”

Reviews.Content: stayed lovely hotel boyfriend found stayed friends great location city centre really charming hotel corner room spacious great view street balcony bathroom clean large staff friendly although didnt actually need help know way around breakfast nice fresh fruit lots choose would recommend hotel anyone

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel, Great Location”
Reviews.Author: ellen_faith
Reviews.Content: daughter booked hotel surprise birthday present never amsterdam know area would best access centre etc perfect choice quiet area near tram services bus service walking distance centre canal boat trips two minutes away designer shops city centre across road literally museums concert hall vondelpark perfect location given upgrade presented complimentary bottle wine arrival birthday superb start much appreciated room clean comfortable bed internet etc etc bar tea making facilities robes slippers etc well breakfast though good feel little overpriced went centre ate well instead staff extremely helpful friendly without familiar couldnt enough us shuttle great purchased museum tickets hotel avoided queues definitely return recommend hotel daughter really enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: Clair&Dave
Reviews.Content: wonderful small hotel stayed great staff better last time locations excellent visit amsterdam 2 blocks rijksmuseum 4 close walk rooms wellappointed

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Clayre8077
Reviews.Content: bilderberg great hotel rooms spacious well appointed beds amazingly comfortable located upscale area amsterdam steps away van gogh rijksmuseum one block tram stop leidseplein five minute walk one tram stop away many great eateries located near well great coffee shops amsterdam quite small foot proximity tram stop great bonus long days hotel opinion great traveler looking party enjoy coffee shops location good short walk tram ride take many great spots end night return quite neighborhood enjoy goods night sleep museums reason traveling bilderberg perfect location overall great property

Reviews.Title: “Amsterdam was lovely!”
Reviews.Author: LJASurrey
Reviews.Content: four nights noisy superior room ground floor corner two oclock though comfortable bed big bathroom bidet internet connection apple turndown bed night radio staff reception helpful restaurants went leidesplein area eat good breakfast included price paid champagne eggs bacon cereals juice rolls croissants available read breakfast stored baggage checked collected car late afternoon map provided well couple vouchers canal trips convenient museums recommend canal trip city trams convenient watch come directions

Reviews.Title: “a lovely small hotel near the museums”
Reviews.Author: SteveKIngston
Reviews.Content: extremely happy know staying upscale part amsterdam hotel beautiful boutique style hotel decided upgrade standard room deluxe room glad made decision room comfortable hotel staff accommodating helpful could ask better location ladies louis store directly behind hotel major museums within block amsterdam sign directly across hotel hotel really far city center actually walk central station 30 40 minutes however make sure know going easily make wrong turn tram within block away walking hop tram would highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “A perfect European getaway”
Reviews.Author: seeker
Reviews.Content: loved location hotel quiet street checked monday seeing room asked available got business class room little balcony room indeed small american standards friends amsterdam visited room said bathroom larger home bathroom room extremely cute close tram therefore close everything wanted see

Reviews.Title: “Don't waste your money - this 'hotel' is a joke !!”
Reviews.Author: TraceWicklow
Reviews.Content: hotel situated fashion district 5 minutes walking leidseplein check quick wished husband happy birthday also put champagne room requested room isnt massive bed really comfy modern excellent bathroom breakfast decided eat every morning bar nice expensive stayed 1 drink didnt use spa looked nice overall fab location really helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful boutique hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: travellinghappyfeet
Reviews.Content: party stayed hotel 3 nights 710 february booked 3 nights price 2 saving hotel beautiful location close adjacent shopping area short stroll took us canal tram stop 20 minutes walk anne frank house stayed triple twin room triple room spacious cons shared room much smaller party complaints hotel clean staff courteous helpful asked directions restaurant reservations etc etc breakfast buffet style cereals selection breads meat scrambled boiled eggs complaint constantly ask water make tea coffee gave us 2 small ones party 5 spa hotel actually small room ground floor bath shower jets give miss went chinese place massage 20 dam square lots lovely restaurants nearby ate great tapas place lovely bagel tapas bagel great time would definetly recommend hotel anyone

Reviews.Title: “Not worth it”
Reviews.Author: ArizonaFlyer
Reviews.Content: hotel situated residential street nice shopping street behind hotel next street room bit small perfectly adequate needs spent little time room pleasant decor chose hotel away main busier areas city disappointed two nights stayed room 110 quite close main lift one level street noisy evening 530 morning people street noise concern read reviews say hotel far looking hotel close van gogh rijksmuseum trams 2 5 stop end road one stop 2 mins main shopping street managed walk around one day see majority sights would disagree far really nice time amsterdam got see everything even didnt manage get much sleep

Reviews.Title: “nice area noisy at night”
Reviews.Author: shareforfun
Reviews.Content: hotel jan luyken around corner 2 major attractions amsterdam block shopping street block tram station takes everywhere dam square 20 minute walk past beautiful sections canals bridges lovely small dutch hotel quite street freindly helpful staff comfortable beds good breakfast north americans cigarette smoke dining room bar initial shock throughout amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience”
Reviews.Author: rosepig
Reviews.Content: hotel chic elegant friendly professional staff though room small wellappointed made good use limited space bed comfortable duvet nice pillows complaint would room reading lights bed didnt work beware breakfast expensive assumed breakfast included room thought would taken morning coffees meals somewhere else good breakfast though also internet fee 5 euro 5 minutes crazy choice wanted confirm return flight home room offers free wireless though would recommend hotel extra charges cant beat location either

Reviews.Title: “Great location, loved our room”
Reviews.Author: jennifert33065
Reviews.Content: despite reading previous reviews regarding problems checking hotel decided stick booking bilderberg make mind shouldnt bothered also arrived reception told receptionist 3 night reservation actually sister hotel located back towards airport booking confirmation would appear worth paper written told reservations go central reservations booking system stop bookings even though hotel full booked hotel july yet heard nothing overbooked say upset putting asked speak manager explained make things worse large group arriving later day order accomodate moved hotel hour later first afternoon amsterdam still see really problem given 2 options manager 1 would try check availability hotels area 2 would agree move sister hotel friday night come back following 2 nights would upgrade room fully believe created fuss would sent hotel 3 nights didnt see much choice waited another taxi bring us back way came check another hotel 1 night stage afternoon lost asked manager think system booking acceptable agreed wasnt simply room us large group left saturday really got impression fairly regular hotel absolutely way business also book nonsmoking room dont think smoke free floor first floor rooms nonsmoking however nights arrived back room found fellow guests sitting smoking outside room would recommend hotel never place makes faulty towers look good

Reviews.Title: “Great for a weekend trip”
Reviews.Author: London-honeymooner
Reviews.Content: hotel pretty located quiet street behind pc highend shopping area also leidseplein 5 min walk away rijksmuseum van gogh museum virtually next door standard rooms small comfortable business rooms bigger well decorated reception friendly helpful breakfast extra generous even champagne internet access charged rate slow equally expensive overall charming hotel good weekend getaway good value money

Reviews.Title: “Loved it”
Reviews.Author: FazSydney
Reviews.Content: booked hotel hotwire expected four star hotel room got bigger cell bed amount paid thought attached room photo

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Friendly Boutique Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Marais1969
Reviews.Content: picked hotel around corner van gogh museum good reviews trip advisor arrival found area looked really nice near shopping street residential road check told hotel full despite reservation luckily arrived early refused move sister hotel central given room jan luyken room small clean hotel within walking distance near pretty canal areas also good connection tram 2 5 unfortunately sleep loud street 3am room top floor facing street bit dissapointing searched place seemed quiet reason overall experience average breakfast extra 18 euro per person selection good though price bit high parking horrible street 34 euro day

Reviews.Title: “A nice hotel for travelers interested in style and convenience”
Reviews.Author: flash_tsquare
Reviews.Content: booked hotel several months ahead special weekend birthday booked direct thorough hotel lots careful research number emails ahead arriving hotel arrange champagne room nice view etc handled politely thought arrival hotel clerk looked worried gave reservation details asked see confirmation email explained hotel fully booked wedding party managed lose booking room us offered us room near hotel hotel much lower star rating main entrance hotel via stairs back restaurant expecting light booking made luxury hotel stay hotel coming back bilderberg speak manager rather found us five star hotel elsewhere fuss business hotel quite romantic break planned fair distance central amsterdam say think carefully booking hotel lose booking despite several emails champagne layout room trying put us hotel appalling

Reviews.Title: “Classy Euro Hotel”
Reviews.Author: zuttoman
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights part honeymoon trip couldnt happier choice hotel conveniently located across street rijksmuseum easy get leidsplein museumplein tram stops room modern comfortable found staff friendly quiet hotel onto street many upscale shops leidsplein short walk tram ride away great area visit night lot restaurants nightlife really enjoyed wandering around amsterdam lot walking also recommend buying card tram tickets able purchase arrived centraal train station

Reviews.Title: “no complaints”
Reviews.Author: 22Sunday
Reviews.Content: booked surprise weekend amsterdam husbands birthday fan boutique hotels seemed like one nicer ones unfortunately quite quirky many boutique hotels style quite bland however smart spotlessly clean reason evenings maid turns radio dutch equivalent capital gold leaves apple never seen handy like apples also within distance museum van gogh museum stayed one larger rooms room number one right street got quite noisy friday night id definitely recommend earplugs quite roomy though bathroom lovely hotel small attractive bar area sitting room also dark breakfast room basement shame couldnt breakfast patio sunny morning real restaurant nearby streets packed great places eat drink stumbled across white around corner 26 easily one best restaurants ever country ever amazing food things learn lot pretty venue charming staff pricey go back hotel though staff friendly hand advice go wouldnt want stay hotel weekend though would get little boring youd get sick apples

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the money”
Reviews.Author: busterlucy
Reviews.Content: great clean friendly hotel great distance main area shopping rest attractions reasonable area highly

Reviews.Title: “Billderberg was brilliant!”
Reviews.Author: nugi
Reviews.Content: stayed jan luyken one night october 2006 hotel conveniently located several blocks rijksmuseum van gogh museum also close walk upscale shopping district lobby hotel clean bright friendly helpful staff members usually case amsterdam staff spoke perfect english hotel cozy area small spa stayed regular room small however space arranged well feel cramped one person furniture fixtures room gave modern feel bathroom among cleanest seen would absolutely recommend hotel pictures come

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't fault it”
Reviews.Author: mince963
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel convenient location practically next door tram two major museums block away upscale shopping district staff friendly professional helpful room although small american standards attractive well appointed breakfast buffet marvelous expensive something didnâ€™t realize checkout time located district restaurant choices immediate area limited would recommend hotel jan luyken travelers interested style convenience might want look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hamsterjam”
Reviews.Author: Blue133
Reviews.Content: great stay room nicely appointed stylish europe rooms small american standard importantly found everything room thought well designed found location excellent location choose ams put closer things farther others personally id rather nearer museums parks go red light district choose also found canal boats relaxing way get around town dock front two minutes away

Reviews.Title: “Good for a city hotel”
Reviews.Author: M&LDerbys
Reviews.Content: location excellent bike rental canal cruise cafes etc nearby crowded places rather quiet street city small anyway afraid see location map room room â€“ huge clean nicely decorated small balcony staff friendly helpful way average pricing eur sunday monday guess amsterdam popular expensive â€“ try book early wherever want stay breakfast hotel went small cafã© max excellent sandwiches forgot name though one next japanese place would try find something cheaper next time apart recommend jan luyken

Reviews.Title: “Only the One problem!!”
Reviews.Author: Howie69
Reviews.Content: excited stay hotel reading rave reviews however disappointing hotel upon arrival clerk tried quite hard get us upgrade bigger room found room gave us literally bigger bed place put anything except bed tiny little narrow closet one could hang things door room open bathroom type youd find ship drain floor shower tub corner also dirty lastly one tiny light making room dark couldnt believe wed paid 250 per night asked moved another room didnt put much fuss said wed move back next night meant couldnt unpack etc imagine happens lot actually heard lots people complaining second room much bigger actual bathroom essential ask large room booking avoid mess also hotel didnt change money sell give helpful advice getting around town location excellent 2 major museums however bit distance rest town expensive area wouldnt stay wonderful looking hotels half price everywhere look amsterdam felt like wed really made mistake didnt let trip felt could done lot lot better paid amsterdam popular place wise book early

Reviews.Title: “Very Happy at the Jan Luyken”
Reviews.Author: Berkeleytraveler
Reviews.Content: read number reviews stayed happily say lovely hotel exceeded expectations location excellent quiet side street within walking distance museums shops bars fabulous weather walked everywhere never used public transport great way explore city room little small furniture really necessary expected offered upgrade â‚¬20 per night didnt bother bed comfortable bathroom overhead shower well handheld power shower even though renovation work street heard little noise room staff friendly polite helpful stay reception bar particularly kind informative even leaving surprise gift told celebrating birthday buffet breakfasts brilliant

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic Boutique Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Aevin
Reviews.Content: found hotel online booked checking reviews trip advisor booked online got cheap rate took advice reviews upgraded superior room hotel replied promptly email perfect english everything sorted room spacious comfortable clean arrived early 10 room ready check despite advised time 3 pm didnt eat hotel use spa use bar couple times staff friendly efficient helpful location good far enough avoid noise city center within easy walking distance bars shops restaurants close tram stops get 5 station taxis overpriced take city tour whether want one would definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Loved it! A great place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: RedJ
Reviews.Content: lovely welcoming hotel thought staff really friendly helpful near van gogh rijksmuseum 25 min walk centre town dont let put get head round tram system really easy get around hotel spa great well worth giving go

Reviews.Title: “Top notch hotel”
Reviews.Author: MarkEMark
Reviews.Content: good location close enough walk centre quiet enough get sleep city hotel staff extremely friendly nothing much trouble even returning sister hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great little luxury hotel”
Reviews.Author: pupumann0
Reviews.Content: wife another couple stayed five nights 20th 25th november 2006 friends birthday 21st decided hotel location good reports site five minute walk hard rock cafe plenty bars eating places although requested superior adjoining rooms found checkin different floors however two guys reception soon sorted small problem room despite special occasion friend didnt wine room mentioned reports however breakfast first morning birthday young waitress name opened cava bucks went well brought another bottle 1030am superior rooms must clean lighting little dark found breakfast first class large variety offer staff ok except guess hotels hotels bad one decided raining food bar guests bar area around eye contact drinks us one pizza came turned cheese instead ordered didnt inform us change quite clearly couldnt care less apology anything spoiled really good day rest staff fantastic whole five days mentioned problem checkout receptionist reduced bar bill night half couldnt enough well worth money would stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location but tiny room”
Reviews.Author: Rutzie
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights room 510 comfortable indeed feature noticed first gorgeous tile inside front door could see beautiful white looked day new flowers bar lobby sitting room bit problem checking missed first night due missed connection however lovely young lady front desk took colleague told us reason reservation wasnt showing already checked one could room needless say much elevator 5th floor wide roomy almost european hotel elevators bit disappointed area rooms placed looked bit inside room however pleased large bathroom huge black marble counter spotless shower great enjoyed hand held shower good toiletries also supplied replenished day one reason give hotel 5 star rating wasnt much room put clothes etc move extra blanket pillow shelves provided however pillow soft comfortable blanket much appreciated room set business traveler even included paper tray converted use storage paper reason didnt give hotel 5 low lighting room made difficult read linens towels lovely twin beds comfortable best feature room window view rooftops amsterdam including great view rijksmuseum left also minibar room enough space milk etc bought local grocery store word warning bottles water placed desk free see anything warning 5 euro charge per bottle however may think items top minibar cost money water placed locations free credit front desk charged 1 bottle rather 2 explained charge also liked electric kettle tea coffee sugar supplied 2 glass tea making easy throughout stay heard sound next door room opening twice thats noise rooms sounds streets appeared quiet day happened sunday monday night bringing cars noted parking area quite expensive front desk clerk telling guests costs 3 euros per hour park street hotel sell voucher parking costs 30 euros per day parking sunday free however took bus airport worked well us location hotel brilliant main entrance rijksmuseum 2 blocks away shopping street rodeo drive beverly hills one street made great window shopping one best italian ive ever di street name wonderful sandwiches priced 45 euros eaten premises taken away also gorgeous salads meats etc easy walk central amsterdam keep walking straight crossing street canal front rijksmuseum come wonderful street full lovely antiques vondelpark 7 minutes away residential area near hotel vondelpark beautiful reminded buildings would definitely stay room location hotel facilities staff great

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Location”
Reviews.Author: QOTU
Reviews.Content: great stay bilderberg jan luyken 2 nights october fantastic boutique style hotel exceptionally helpful staff location wise couldnt better right around corner rijksmuseum van gogh museum vondelpark also couple minutes walk away attractions easily reached either foot tram tip buy tickets museums hotel reception great way avoid queues

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant and convenient hotel”
Reviews.Author: bristolreviewer
Reviews.Content: visited hotel three night stay amsterdam mini break getting really good deal price room hotel website three hotels looking reading reviews trip advisor settled one arrival staff warm friendly taking time show location hotel relation rest city nearest tram stops etc wouldnt get lost also asked much paid taxi make sure hadnt ripped offering advice much fares certain places realised certain amount got room found freshly chilled bottle champagne ice waiting us mentioned fact recently married card us nice surprise considering got deal room good size lovely comfortable large bed quiet considering room hallway near lift room bathroom impeccably clean well maintained throughout stay simple chic design rest hotel lovely traditional dutch building used quite old features well designed modern fittings make whole place feel comfortable chic hotels felt relaxed throughout stay staff always friendly efficient providing us bathrobes adaptor upon request werent charged adaptor contrary someone review even booking us table fantastic chinese restaurant recommended us reason chinese night go figure would definitely go back hotel aside lovely stay made feel relaxed great location quiet street smart district also minutes walk away within easy walking distance parts city

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: conthemon
Reviews.Content: stayed jan luyken february year excellent boutique style hotel well located especially museum area booked directly hotel 3 night stay good price also included complementary meal one night jan sister hotel ams heard rooms quite small requested executive room brilliant large queen size bed tv wall player minibar hairdryer nicely bathroom toiletries nice decor hotel chic feel staff friendly located area neighbouring street main designer shopping area names etc present 2 minute walk rijksmuseum tram stop also located take 2 different tram lines remember correctly number 1 2 end central station pass main areas total journey time never 5 minutes would definately recommend hotel travellers refreshing change large hotels mark

Reviews.Title: “Gezellig”
Reviews.Author: oohmercyme
Reviews.Content: stayed mini break loved lovely modern rooms view great staff perfect location would definately come back
